survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace AI Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with AI-powered tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered tools in your daily work tasks?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency of usage.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered tools in your daily work tasks?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools do you use at work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: AI-based HR tools (e.g., recruitment, performance feedback)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice options to identify the most commonly used AI tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice), include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools do you use at work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: AI-based HR tools (e.g., recruitment, performance feedback)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered tools used in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback for improvement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered tools used in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that AI-powered tools have improved your productivity at work?
answer_options: No, it has decreased my productivity
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess perceived impact on productivity.

script.question_text: Do you feel that AI-powered tools have improved your productivity at work?
answer_options: No, it has decreased my productivity
